html:
11.19.24  8:48 pm   you can't stare infinitely off into the horizon due to the curvature of the earth. if the world was flat, could you see everything?

      there would be hills in the way. oh wait but if the world is flat then i suppose that means the hills are flat too. but there would be trees in the way. oh wait but if the world is flat then i suppose that means trees are flat too. ok so you could see everything else. wait but if the world is flat then everything would be flat. your eyes would be also flat. in conclusion, if some things were flat, other than your eyes and some additional things, nevermind, the answer is no

11.19.24  8:15 pm   why don't you use capital letters

      perhaps you have me confused with yourself

11.19.24  8:11 pm   Do all time zones differ in hour intervals, or is there anywhere that's like a half hour or 15min (or like X.25 or X.5 hours) later/earlier? 

      examples of half-hour offsets: newfoundland, india, iran, central australia. examples of quarter offsets: eucla australia, chatham islands nz

11.19.24  8:04 pm   do you think anxiety can be useful?

      maybe yes, but i'm kind of afraid to say that

11.19.24  7:59 pm   whats the best type of cake objectively

      object cake

11.19.24  7:56 pm   every night when i fall asleep i see a door in my dreams, it haunts me, just standing there in the distance of the rooms i wade through
should i go through it

      sure. you might not even have to open it

11.19.24  6:53 pm   Do you feel a sense of accomplishment when you finish and publish a project

      yes

11.19.24  6:10 pm   how do I stop slacking off and start slacking on?

      the task was never mentioned in this. that's really the first thing you have to change

11.19.24  5:32 pm   Solve for x:
5x+3=2x+12

      3

11.19.24  5:03 pm   im addicted to your music should i keep listening (i'm going to regardless)

      sure

11.19.24  4:59 pm   do you like backronyms?

      backronyms always create kinda random odd nuances, you might say

11.19.24  3:37 pm   Would you be interested in getting an in depth analysis (based on opinion, of course) of at least one of your songs

      sure. i'm ashamed to admit that i have a tendency to enjoy pointing out when people's analyses of me are incorrect, but, by the same token i do readily admit when i feel someone gets it right

11.19.24  3:19 pm   How do you make the videos of you in some songs. Like, do you think of what you're gonna do beforehand, or do you just improv it. Do you sing and dance/play the air drums/the guitar,  to the whole song and then just pick out some parts that could work?

     pretty much yes

     Also, the air drums look really cool, do you actually know how to play drums?

     yes

11.19.24  2:41 pm   hi bill, can you help me understand how chord inversions/voicings affect the way the listener perceives the progression?

     i think you get closer to understanding when you take out words like 'progression' and 'inversion' and 'voicing'. but it's really just like a magic moment experienced between people. totally impossible to describe what exactly happened and how it happened. this is one of the major strongpoints of music, and other communicational arts

     are there any problems that could occur if they are poorly executed?

     the biggest failure in music is for it to make the listener totally indifferent to, or worse, repelled away from, the things or places where that music is played

11.19.24  2:37 pm   how do you proceed with a song which is obviously not finished however there are already elements that are super exciting though no further ideas come to how to connect it and develop further. its driving me insane because it feels so rigid and I seem to lack the skill to songwrite it further adequately.

      try to find a way to definitely ruin it. maybe something that says 'this is how i would ruin it if i was going to ruin it, but anyway, here's the thing, including the part that we all liked'

11.19.24  2:32 pm   Do you know how to operate a manual transmission?

      moreover, i am uncomfortable operating an automatic

11.19.24  12:19 pm   how do i bring my mental presence with my physical presence

      start moving around however you want to

11.19.24  11:53 am   does love conquer all?

      i think so, but its powers are often diminished by advertising it directly under the "love" branding

11.19.24  11:52 am   are you a poopy head?

      no

11.19.24  11:34 am   What do you in ur free time

      my time is actually very expensive

11.19.24  11:33 am   Whenever I try to come up with a musical phrase, I get frustrated that the chords that I put with it are too simple and sound empty. How do I avoid this.

      you just need to spend more time enjoying, doing, and being curious about, music. Just like language, the more time you spend with it, the better you get and the more genuinely it starts to fit you

11.19.24  11:25 am   what's a recent meme you genuinely find funny

      the weather

11.19.24  11:11 am   Does making music videos take longer than it used to pre-2020, now that you've "modernized" your style and incorporated 3D, or does it take about the same amount of time?

      no matter the method, i will find a way to make it take a chronically long time

11.19.24  10:16 am   your music brings me back to my center. what does that say about me

      what does it say about my music

11.19.24  9:21 am   If you could invent a new letter what would it be called

      that's not nearly as important as what it would do, but i'd probably rather revive a previously existing letter than make a new one

11.19.24  8:52 am   what was the bad thing you did

      made a song

11.19.24  8:30 am   do you see yourself inside or outside of the fishbowl?

      i'm outside of all fishbowls

11.19.24  8:16 am   favorite letter of the alphabet?

      ç

11.19.24  4:54 am   i created two terrible things today, one was a performance and the other was an article. i wish i could go back and change them but i can't, so here i am confessing to my crimes to make myself feel a little better

      fair enough

11.19.24  2:44 am   do you have any tips for someone new to bass? 

      most importantly, find it in your favorite music and enjoy what it's doing for the music

11.19.24  2:00 am   what makes music a better way to explain things than words?

      that's exactly the kind of thing i probably can't explain in only words

11.19.24  1:00 am   is love from a person who otherwise hates everyone and everything worth more than love from an empath who naturally has a big heart full of loving-kindness?

      based only on your description, it sounds sort of like the first person might be kind of maniupulative and the second person is kinda fake. but that's just my impression based on only your description, so that could be a total of 2 or more steps removed from how it actually is

11.19.24  12:15 am   do you like whales

      i don't know whales well enough to know whether or not i like them

11.18.24  11:42 pm   do you ever feel resentment toward your passions? i suppose a better word for this is frustration but what i mean is RESENTMENT

      i don't think i've ever felt this way, but i could be misinterpreting how you're describing it

11.18.24  10:43 pm   the only kick that fits the song i'm making is from long long long journey, what should i do in this situation

      i think it's time to go out to that fence in the backyard and more closely examine the greenness of the grasses on each side. Who knows how many times i've felt that exact way about someone else's work, maybe even for that exact same song

11.18.24  10:14 pm   Do you watch TV shows? Have you been unsatisfied by TV Dramas so you basically started to write your own?

      that's not entirely untrue

11.18.24  7:01 pm   have you ever tried to not make a video?

      not exactly

11.18.24  6:56 pm   my drawings are starting to look boring and repetitive what can i do to break the pattern and make the same old lines, shapes etc

      this may seem like a dumb idea, but i promise it's smart. have you ever drawn a football before

11.18.24  6:39 pm   would you like to travel to rural Arkansas with me (you would be 1 of 12 other people to fit in the same car)

      not right now

11.18.24  6:00 pm   what do you think of taking baby steps everywhere you go?

      that reminds me of What About Bob

11.18.24  5:51 pm   should i continue making videos where i point at stuff

      yes!!!!!!!!!!!

11.18.24  5:07 pm   thoughts on the edge of the universe?

      seems pretty chill

11.18.24  4:08 pm   Is it a good idea to drop out of college

      maybe of maybe not, but it gets even more complicated if you are not the one putting the money up

11.18.24  3:28 pm   when first listening to a song, is it advisable to put off the analyzing-why-it-works until later? at first i just want to enjoy the song and not think about why it works, but also i think that by doing so i'm getting used to the novel things that would be important for analysis.

      ultimately you'll probably never figure out exactly "why" it works. but you'll have even less of a chance if you never even let it work on you first hand in the first place. in fact, it's quite common for songs to work in a completely new way, different from how any other songs have worked in the past. so certainly if you rush to judgement then you'll easily miss that new and different boat

11.18.24  3:16 pm   why is science so hard for me to understand? like I'm good at literature, math and government so science seems like it should be easy but it just isn't

      sometimes it helps if you are put in a position where you need to actually do the science yourself

11.18.24  2:38 pm   What's the weirdest biome name to give to a person?

      oceanic plankton

11.18.24  2:16 pm   How did you acquire such impressive insights? I keep coming back to you and acknowledging there's quite no one that thinks with so much sense that you do.

      ah good, then i shall direct you straight over to the cult sign-up page

11.18.24  1:41 pm   Does 6 figures mean 1,000,000 or 100,000? 

      i think it means 6 digits (that would be less than 1 million). at least i think that's what it's supposed to mean

11.18.24  12:29 pm   What question should I ask you to get the answer I'm curious about? The problem is that I don't know what the answer is (obviously) but I also don't know what the question leading to that answer is. It has something to do with your creative process and artistic voice. 

      in that case, it's on me to make as much content as i can, to ensure that you get a steadily deeper picture of who i am and what the heck is going on in general

11.18.24  11:44 am   What is the best thing?

      every thing is equally good
